Package com.google.code.play

Class Summary
AbstractAntJavaBasedPlayMojo Base class for Ant Java task using mojos.
AbstractAntJavaBasedPlayMojo.JavaRunnable Internal runnable wrapper for Ant Java task.
AbstractArchivingMojo Base class for Play! packaging mojos.
AbstractDependencyProcessingPlayMojo Base class for Play! dependency processing mojos.
AbstractPlayDistMojo Base class for Play! distribution packaging mojos.
AbstractPlayMojo Base class for all Play! mojos.
AbstractPlayRunMojo Base class for Play! server synchronously starting ("run" and "test") mojos.
AbstractPlayServerMojo Base class for Play! server mojos.
AbstractPlayStartServerMojo Base class for Play! server asynchronously starting ("start" and "start-server") mojos.
AbstractPlayStopServerMojo Base class for Play! server stopping ("stop" and "stop-server") mojos.
AbstractPlayWarMojo Base class for Play! war packaging mojos.
ConfigurationParser Play! configuration file ("conf/application.conf") reader.
HelpMojo Display help information on play-maven-plugin.
PidFileDeleter Shutdown hook responsible for deleting "server.pid" file.
PlayCleanMojo Clean Play! temporary directories.
PlayDependenciesMojo Extract project dependencies to "lib" and "modules" directories.
PlayDistExplodedMojo Create exploded Play! framework and Play! application (standalone distribution).
PlayDistMojo Package Play! framework and Play! application as one zip achive (standalone distribution).
PlayGenerateSeleniumJunit4SourcesMojo Generate JUnit test wrapper source files for Selenium tests.
PlayInitializeMojo Initialize Play! Maven project
PlayPrecompileMojo Invoke Play! precompilation.
PlayRunMojo Run Play! server ("play run" equivalent).
PlayStartMojo Start Play! server ("play start" equivalent).
PlayStartServerMojo Start Play! server before integration testing.
PlayStopMojo Stop Play! server ("play stop" equivalent).
PlayStopServerMojo Stop Play! server after integration testing.
PlayTestRunMojo Run Play! server in test mode ("play test" equivalent).
PlayWarExplodedMojo Create an exploded Play! application webapp in specified directory.
PlayWarInplaceMojo Create an exploded Play! application webapp in war source directory.
PlayWarMojo Package Play! application as a war achive.
PlayWarSupportMojo Prepare project for war packaging.
PlayZipMojo Package Play! application as a zip achive.
